A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
where to even start with this?
the last jedi is an utter abomination of flimflamming that makes the prequels look on par with the original trilogy.
from start to finish this movie is ether nonsensical (eg the tumblr hair general refusing to let anyone\, including other senior officers like poe\, know that she actually has a plan witch ends up causing the death of at minimum 75% of the ships crew.)\, pointless (the entire sub-plot with finn and that Asian chick nobody cares about)\, or actively slapping its audience in the face (giveing zero information about snoke\, rey's parents being nobody's\, emasculating then killing off luke for no reason).
